Texts.Chs: 把1份^orange;中子素和反中子素^reset;带给^red;凯文^reset;

Texts.Eng: Holy....$%^&#%ing @#$@%@ you did it. I guess you aren't the dumbass I had assumed. In return, I give you this super-neat technology blueprint I found lying around in the ^orange;Anti-Realm^reset;! No, I won't tell you where that is. It's known only to Gregs, myself, and a fried wonton located on Rigel IV. You can't know, because you aren't special like Dave.

Wanna try something ^orange;super fun^reset;? Let's create something previously thought to be ^green;hypotehtical^reset;! Let's try making ^orange;Neutronium^reset; and ^orange;Anti-Neutronium^reset;! I'll give you something ^red;truly amazing^reset; if you can do it! I promise. For real, this time.
